TopicTitle: Why are my survey, surveillance, and mapping contracts not completing?

Articles.Content:
Since I installed version 1.12 (and upgraded to 1.12.1), with the latest BG, and my mods, none of the survey, surveillance, or mapping contracts complete. I've even built a ship with every camera, scanner, and other surveillance device, and sent it on one of the contracts, and allowed it to orbit for about 7 days, and NONE of the science or other collected data, triggers any of the tasks for that contract.   I know I can use alt-f12, but I'd prefer to just complete the contracts. I'm not getting any errors, just not getting the completion. I've even tried looking at the various contracts code, to see if there is a specific device I need to have on board. but I'm not finding any.

Here is my modlist:

BreakingGround-DLC
ZeroMiniAVC
ASETAgency

OOPS, this was for my post about repair contracts, NOT the survey/surveillance/mapping contracts:    I got the answer to this in another thread. It seems you have to have the repair packs in the _right_ inventory.
